p:
Our meta-analysis of gene expression data from 7017 individuals from six studies identified and characterized whole blood gene expression signatures associated with BP traits. Thirty-four BP signature genes were identified at Bonferroni corrected p<0.05 (224 genes were identified at FDR<0.2, reported in the
S1 Text ). Thirteen BP signature genes replicated between the FHS and Illumina cohorts. The top BP signature genes identified in the FHS (55 genes for SBP and 22 genes for DBP) explained 5â€“9% of interindividual variation in BP in the Illumina cohorts on average.
